mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A scan of the "Senate Cuts Special Master Funds" article in the West Chester Daily Local newspaper discussing the funding cuts to the Office of the Special Master. Senators in favor of the cuts argued that the Office of the Master was unnecessary and believed that the Department of Public Welfare already fulfilled that duty.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
